Gali Masks For Sale At A Store Near You?!?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2000 Topics (Year Of The Phoenix): Gali Masks For Sale At A Store Near You?!?
By Lisa Shock on Monday, November 27, 2000 - 07:41 pm:

I found Gali Masks in several sizes ($4.99 and up) at Cost Plus World Market. If there's one near you, you may want to check them out. The one near me had them on an endcap in the basket/tiki torch section.

By Fade X on Tuesday, November 28, 2000 - 12:09 pm:

These are not offical MR Gali ones are they? They are just the Mexican ones you were talking about in another post correct?

By Lisa Shock on Tuesday, November 28, 2000 - 01:21 pm:

They are not licensed Tecmo products, just the original items.
